mutants.original_line: highest_peaks = [peak for peak in peaks if peak == max_peak]
mutants.mutated_line: highest_peaks = [peak for peak in peaks if peak != max_peak]

mutants.original_line: peak = max(peak, data[i]) if peak is not None else data[i]
mutants.mutated_line: peak = max(peak, data[i]) if peak is None else data[i]
